summary: The knife that thinks it's a hatchet
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/25612-1-1350445534.png[/img]

[youtube]81NZFUq_p-4[/youtube]

[youtube]Jt1dMv6jizk[/youtube]


Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1.0

October 16, 2012

1. Introduction
2: Installation
3: Credits
4. Version History

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

This mod provides a nepal-style Kukri to the game. Its forward-curved blade allows this heavy, thick-bladed knife to act much like a hatchet. In-game, this means it benefits from both Bladesman and Hack'n'slash perks.

To craft, purchase the "Notes on crafting a Kukri" note item from Warmaiden's. It is priced so that new player characters will find it prohibitively expensive. It requires the Elven smithing perk, and requires an Iron Ingot, two Steel Ingots, a Horker Tusk, and three Leather Strips for matreials.


NOTE: THIS MOD IS TO BE DISTRIBUTED ONLY FROM SKYRIM NEXUS. ANY COPY FOUND ELSEWHERE IS DISTRIBUTED BY A MOD PIRATE.


===============
2. INSTALLATION
===============

Unpack the ESP module "NepaleseKukri.esp" and the accompanying Meshes folder into your SkyrimData directory. Or let Nexus Mod Manager do it all for you.


==========
3. CREDITS
==========

Mesh made by MadCat221. Textures made by AJ Camp.

==================
4. VERSION HISTORY
==================

Initial Release.
